title: Greg Is Back! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.03.22
description:
The Shooting Star, the Crow of our Generation Greg Miller returns to Kinda Funny Games Daily after three months off to talk GoldenEye 007 on Xbox, Final Fantasy XVI, and NFTs!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:52 - Housekeeping

PS I Love You XOXO is recording later today and we’re talking about our PlayStation Predictions for 2022 so make sure you write in to Patreon so we can get your questions and comments read on the show.

Speaking of Patreon, we have a cool ass shirt for Platinum subs! 

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Black Jack, & Pranksy

The Roper Report -
00:: - GoldenEye’s Xbox Achievements! Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:17:20 - Final Fantasy XVI Update
00:22:40 - Speaking of Square Enix, let’s talk about NFTs!
00:36:40 - Ad  
00:39:40 - Riot agrees to pay $100 million in settlement of class-action gender discrimination lawsuit, Shannon Liao @ WaPo
00:45:40 - Samsung TV’s Gaming Hub, Sean Hollister @ The Verge
00:54:00 - Out today
00:57:30 - Squad Up:probablyoliver (Discord) - probablyoliver#5779
REQUIRED READING:
The Next Video Game From BioShock’s Creator Is in Development Hell, Jason @ Bloomberg  https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-01-03/bioshock-creator-s-next-game-and-its-narrative-legos-in-turmoil
The Version of Bully 2 You’ll Never Get to Play, Blake Hester @ GI
https://www.gameinformer.com/2021/12/30/the-version-of-bully-2-youll-never-get-to-play
01:02:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Tues: Greg and Gary Whitta
Wed: Blessing and Andy
Thurs: Greg and Tim
Fri: Greg and Blessing

The Shooting Star, the Crow of our Generation Greg Miller returns to Kinda Funny Games Daily after three months off to talk GoldenEye 007 on Xbox, Final Fantasy XVI, and NFTs!


Time Stamps -

00:00:00 - Start

00:05:52 - Housekeeping

  • PS I Love You XOXO is recording later today and we’re talking about our PlayStation Predictions for 2022 so make sure you write in to Patreon so we can get your questions and comments read on the show.
  • Speaking of Patreon, we have a cool ass shirt for Platinum subs! 
  • Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Black Jack, & Pranksy
